title: Help ID: The Elements of Typographic Style version 3.2—title font on front cover—reference attached image
content:
The usual suspects are having a difficult time identifying the typeface used on the cover of Bringhurst's The Elements of Typographic Style, version 3.2. Anybody recognize it? Please and thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Elements3x.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216182740/http:/typophile.com/files/Elements3x.jpg) | 50.12 KB |
author: David Brown
